author: Constantino (Constante) Ribalaigua Vert
description: Classically tangy Daiquiri sweetened with pomegranate syrup and a splash of maraschino.
name: Daiquiri No.5 (Pink Daiquiri)
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
